mapper.select: select A.category_name , board_seq, subject,content,readCnt ,to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS regDate , C.employee_name , status,commentCnt from board_category A join board_table B on A.category_seq = B.fk_category_num join employees_table C ON C.employee_seq = B.fk_employee_seq where B.fk_category_num = 1

select A.category_name , board_seq, subject,content,readCnt ,to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS regDate , C.employee_name AS employee_name , status,commentCnt from board_category A join board_table B on A.category_seq = B.fk_category_num join employees_table C ON C.employee_seq = B.fk_employee_seq where B.fk_category_num = 2
